page.title: 17Heywood
page.content: Heywood is about 2 miles from North Bradley and about 1 mile from Westbury. We have got a Church but we do not use it no more becuse they are going to knock it down. Instaed we got a old hut. We have a Railway running through the village.At the top of Norlaeze is a playing field there is nothing init really its just a field. We have not got a post office. To the south of Heywood village is Heywood House and its park lands.The National Trust own the house and it there headquarters.It is not open to the public.
